children.value:
Everyone should be using Agile. If you aren't Agile, you aren't effective. We all need Agile, we all want Agile.
Yet you can ask 100 teams what Agile means and you'll get 99 staunchly defended definitions. That 1 in 100 team
is the one that admits they have no idea what's going on. I certainly don't claim to have the answer to what form of
Agile is best. I do however, have experience on one of those 1 in a 100 teams. A team that was willing to admit our
system was broken and be willing to experiment with solutions. In this blog post you'll learn what we did, only alot
easier and quicker than it took us.
